name: tianhuili-book
description: This is Tianhui Li's repository for projects in the book Pro MERN Stack (2nd Ed) by Vasan Subramanian.   * The README.md is an entry for each chapter. It is in descending order. It will include what I learned each charpter and the challages and problems I encountered. A screenshot of the current state of my work will also be covered.   * A tag will be added to represent each completed chapter, including codes and screenshots.
